name: Baicon rescue
description:
Participating in Monthly Scratch Jam #5 https://itch.io/jam/monthly-scratch-jam-5

This is a game about a space ship that loves baicon but one day an alien appear and steal baicon so the ship start a time loop to get his baicon back

thanks to DOS88 for the music https://dos88.itch.io/dos-88-music-library

thanks to Griffpach for the tile engine and the rocket explosion sound

thanks to someone for the BG (I couldn't find the person srry)
